programme.title: William J Brennan and David Souter
programme.short_synopsis: How does the a new judge become appointed to the Supreme Court?
programme.medium_synopsis: The resignation of Justice William J Brennan and the appointment of David Souter, and the process of appointing a new judge to the Supreme Court, as discussed by Alistair Cooke.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
